title: Shining_Ark_JPN_PSP-PLAYASiA
description:

  .::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::. 
 .::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::.
 .::                                                                        ::.
 .::      Region.........: Japan            Languages.....: Japanese        ::.
 .::      Platform.......: PSP              Format........: .ISO            ::.
 .::      Filename.......: pa-shinark.      Size..........: 75 x 20 mb      ::.
 .::      Disc Serial....: NPJH-50717       CRC32.........: DFD7B472        ::.
 .::                                                                        ::.
  .::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::. 
 .::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::.
 .::                                                                        ::.
 .::                                                                        ::.
 .::        Shining Ark takes place in Arcadia, a beautiful island          ::.
 .::        constantly under the pirates' attack. To protect the            ::.
 .::        villagers from the armed sea bandits, the young men             ::.
 .::        formed a defence force.                                         ::.
 .::                                                                        ::.
 .::        However, are they prepared to fight the massive monster         ::.
 .::        Nephilim? A struggle of the grandest scale starts the day       ::.
 .::        the young man Freed finds an angel washed up the shore.         ::.
 .::                                                                        ::.
 .::        The angel Panis seems to have a special power in her            ::.
 .::        songs, and mysterious foes are after her special power.         ::.
 .::        Besides fighting on land, sometimes they have to sail out       ::.
 .::        to the seas to meet the pirates. But fighting is just one       ::.
 .::        part of the game, from harvesting produce to baking             ::.
 .::        bread, there are lots to do.                                    ::.
 .::                                                                        ::.
 .::       <a href=" http://shining-world.jp/ark/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW"> http://shining-world.jp/ark/</a>                                    ::.
 .::                                                                        ::.
 .::                                                                        ::.
